metadata.title: CVE-2022-4129 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the Linux kernel's Layer 2 Tunneling Protocol (L2TP). Amissing lock when clearing sk_user_data can lead to a race condition andNULL pointer dereference. A local user could use this flaw to potentiallycrash the system causing a denial of service.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
